column1: 1,Verify Successful Order Completion for iPhone Cases,"Navigate to the iPhone cases category page. Select a price range, choose an item, and proceed to checkout. Fill in shipping details, continue to payment, and complete the order. Verify the 'Thank You' page.","Step 1: Navigate to https://cellphone-staging.aut.katalon.com/category/chekhly-na-iphone
Step 2: Click on input field 'price min'
Step 3: Click on input field 'price min'
Step 5: Proceed to checkout, fill shipping details, and continue to payment

column2: - Step 1: Click on button 'Proceed to checkout' -> Navigate to page 'checkout/info'
- Step 2: Click on input field 'email'
- Step 3: Enter input value in input field 'email'
- Step 4: Click on button 'CONTINUE TO SHIPPING' -> Navigate to page 'checkout/shipping-address'
- Step 5: Click on input field 'shipping address.first name'
- Step 6: Enter input value in input field 'shipping address.first name'
- Step 7: Click on input field 'shipping address.last name'
- Step 8: Enter input value in input field 'shipping address.last name'
- Step 9: Click on div
- Step 10: Click on input field 'shipping address.address line 1'
- Step 11: Enter input value in input field 'shipping address.address line 1'
- Step 12: Click on input field 'shipping address.zip'
- Step 13: Enter input value in input field 'shipping address.zip'
- Step 14: Click on input field 'shipping address.city'
- Step 15: Enter input value in input field 'shipping address.city'
- Step 16: Click on input field 'shipping address.state'
- Step 17: Enter input value in input field 'shipping address.state'
- Step 18: Click on input field 'shipping address.phone'
- Step 19: Enter input value in input field 'shipping address.phone'
- Step 20: Click on button 'CONTINUE TO PAYMENT'

column1: Step 6: Click on button 'COMPLETE ORDER' -> Navigate to page 'thank-you/*'
Step 7: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

,High
2,Verify Checkout Process for Apple Products,Navigate to the home page and access the Apple category. Choose an item, add it to the cart, and proceed to checkout. Fill in shipping details, continue to payment, and verify the checkout payment page.","Step 1: Navigate to https://cellphone-staging.aut.katalon.com/
Step 2: Click on link 'Apple' -> Navigate to page 'category/apple'
Step 8: Proceed to checkout, fill shipping details, and continue to payment
